mapper.select: select Count(*) from rr where rr_type = 0
select Count(*) from rr where rr_type between 0 and 1
select Count(*) from rr where rr_type = 2
select Count(*) from rr where rr_type = 3

select * from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select r.*,e.emp_name from rr r,emp e where r.emp_num=e.emp_num and r.rr_type between 0 and 1 order by r.rr_date desc) a ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

select e.emp_name as emp_name, d.content as dcontent,t.content as tcontent,r.content as rcontent from emp e, comm d, comm t, comm r where e.dep_num = d.code and e.team_num = t.code and e.rnk_num = r.code and emp_num = #{emp_num}
mapper.insert: insert into rr(emp_num, rr_num, rr_type, rr_subject, rr_content, rr_date) values (#{emp_num}, rr_seq.nextval, #{rr_type}, #{rr_subject}, #{rr_content}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update rr set rr_subject=#{rr_subject}, rr_content=#{rr_content}, rr_date=sysdate where rr_num = #{rr_num}
